default.name: Tournament

rules.title: Check-In Required
rules.description: All participants must check in before the tournament starts. No-shows will be disqualified.

rules.title: Match Format
rules.description: All matches are best-of-3 games unless otherwise specified. Grand Finals may be best-of-5.

rules.title: Lateness
rules.description: Players have 5 minutes to report to their assigned station when their match is called. Late arrivals forfeit the first game.

rules.title: Conduct
rules.description: Unsportsmanlike conduct, harassment, or cheating will result in immediate disqualification. Keep it friendly!

rules.title: Final Decision
rules.description: Tournament organizers have the final say on all rulings and disputes.

additionalInfo: Tournament bracket will be posted before the event starts
Questions? Ask a tournament organizer at the venue

ssbu.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate

rules.title: Tournament Format
rules.description: Single Elimination bracket. 1 vs 1. 32-player cap.

rules.title: Match Format
rules.description: All matches are best-of-3 games.

rules.title: Stock & Time
rules.description: 3 stocks, 7-minute timer. If time runs out, Sudden Death will determine the winner.

rules.title: Stage Selection
rules.description: Battlefield and Omega stages only. No other stages are legal.

rules.title: Items
rules.description: All items are OFF. No items will spawn during matches.

rules.title: Character Selection
rules.description: All characters are legal. Players may switch characters between games.

rules.title: Lateness
rules.description: Players have 2 minutes to report to their station when called. Late arrivals forfeit the match.

rules.title: Conduct
rules.description: Unsportsmanlike conduct, harassment, or cheating will result in immediate disqualification. Keep it friendly!

additionalInfo: Entry is FREE - no entry fee required!
BYOC (Bring Your Own Controller) - loaner controllers available if needed
All DLC characters are legal (including newest releases)
Custom controls and button mapping are allowed

mkw.name: Mario Kart World

rules.title: Tournament Format
rules.description: Single Elimination bracket. 1 vs 1.

rules.title: Match Format
rules.description: Each match is a 3-race Grand Prix. Player with most points at the end of 3 races advances.

rules.title: Race Settings
rules.description: 150cc, Normal Items, Normal COMs.

rules.title: Track Selection
rules.description: Random track selection. No track bans.

rules.title: Scoring
rules.description: Standard Mario Kart scoring applies. Points accumulated across all 3 races determine the winner.

additionalInfo: Entry is FREE - no entry fee required!
BYOC (Bring Your Own Controller) - loaner controllers available if needed
All vehicles and characters are allowed
Unsportsmanlike conduct, harassment, or cheating will result in immediate disqualification. Keep it friendly!

halo3.name: Halo 3

rules.title: Tournament Format
rules.description: Single Elimination bracket. 1 vs 1

rules.title: Match Format
rules.description: Best of 1 match. Score to win = 15

rules.title: Game Mode
rules.description: Slayer

rules.title: Map Selection
rules.description: Guardian, Heretic, The Pit, Narrows

rules.title: Equipment & Weapons
rules.description: Standard weapon spawns.

additionalInfo: Entry is FREE - no entry fee required!
BYOC (Bring Your Own Controller) - Xbox controllers recommended
Unsportsmanlike conduct, harassment, or cheating will result in immediate disqualification. Keep it friendly!
